title: Рехаб
overview: Rehab is a unique center of women's psychological help. Under his roof, gathered young women, each of which at one time experienced a great tragedy.Due to different life circumstances, these girls are mired in depression, have lost interest in life and can not get rid of suicidal thoughts. Someone became a victim of domestic violence, someone betrayed the family, someone can not overcome alcohol and food addiction. "Rehab" is their last chance to start a new life.Under the guidance of experienced coaches, psychologists, business and fitness trainers, the participants of the project will try to get rid of the nightmares of the past, forgive the offenders and love themselves. Together they have to go through many hours of training and group therapy, but before - learn to get along under one roof.Bright personality, who have an explosive temperament, will try to curb their character. After all, the most important thing in "Rehab" is a victory over oneself.
